entities.description: Any long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused or worsened by cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Continued use of cocaine despite causing long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health.
Reduction in engagement in important activities due to cocaine use in the past 12 months.
Important activities including spending time with friends and family, attending special events, participating in hobbies, sports, or religious services and events.

relationships.description: Relates cocaine use to causing long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health.
Indicates continued use of cocaine despite causing emotional or mental health problems.
Relates cocaine use to reduced engagement in important activities.
Defines the scope of important activities affected by cocaine use.
